title: The Mad Cultivator - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Ecchi   Harem   Mature   Xianxia
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Age Progression   Average-looking Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Cunning Protagonist   Daoism   Hard-Working Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World   Shameless Protagonist   Threesome

description: The Mad Cultivator follows the tale of Ye Kong, a rude and vulgar thug from modern day China. While collecting protection fees, he was sent to another world! By the time he realized what was going on, he was possessing the body of an idiot. Watch as Ye Kong struggles against fate to climb the road to immortality! >
